file_content.text: Perhaps I'll just call for an escort home. My thanks again.
An excellent job! My fellows should recover from their enslavement--nothing a return to civilization won't cure.
I hope this is adequate payment? Better you have my credits than some Tatooine pickpocket.
You have my thanks. Now, which way is Anchorhead, I wonder?
That slave caravan is only getting further away!
Ah, good. Perhaps a Jedi can correct this injustice!
Finally. I've been waiting hours for a Republic patrol to come along.
Reduced to begging from wandering spacers. You! Come here, I... need your help.
You there! I've been waiting hours for some enterprising citizen to help me.
I am Tai'ya Rocca, representative to the Republic. My fellow ambassadors and I were touring the dunes, when we were ambushed by an uncouth warlord.
Such men thrive on lawless worlds like this.
Tatooine is full of them.
Oh, thank you. If only you'd been around with such sage advice beforehand!
Curiosity has its dangers.
There won't be a next time, I assure you! This was horror enough.
If you're so important, you should have hired some protection.
You didn't bring any guards?
We had guides! Professional bodyguards are expensive out here!
What is there to look at on Tatooine, apart from sand and rock?
Sightseeing? Here?
There's nothing wrong with seeking exotic adventure! Just, not this much.
Keep going.
Did this warlord kill your friends?
So everyone else is dead?
No, worse.
That warlord captured everyone in the ambassadorial party--not for ransom, like a civilized being, but as slaves.
If that slave caravan gets away into the deep desert, we'll never be able to track them!
I'll take care of it.
It's a big desert. Tracking one slave caravan won't be easy.
How can I find them?
The caravan was heading in that direction. You could get ahead of that warlord and his men.
Don't be long. I'll be waiting for my fellows to return.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Then get out of my sight. Perhaps some other citizen will do their duty.
Can't you see I have no time for trivialities?
Our guides gave us these survival flares, just in case--see, you can set them on a timer to explode.
Plant that flare, wait for the caravan, then give that warlord's men what they deserve!
I expect better of the Jedi. Your Council will hear of this!
Then get out of my sight. Perhaps some other citizen will do his duty.
I'm not sure if Jedi accept payment, but better you have my credits than some Tatooine pickpocket. Here.
